gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 109, Pacers 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeated the Pacers, 109-105. Jalen Brunson led the way with 40 points and five rebounds for the Knicks, with Isaiah Hartenstein adding 12 points, 19 rebounds, and six assists in the victory. Jalen Smith tallied 20 points, nine rebounds, and two steals for the Pacers in the losing effort. The Knicks have won nine consecutive games and improve to 32-17, while the Pacers fall to 27-22.
